text: Three ships of the Royal Fleet Auxiliary have borne the name RFA Orangeleaf: * was a Leaf-class tanker launched in 1916 in RFA Bornol, renamed RFA Orangeleaf in 1917 and sold in 1947. * was a tanker launched in 1955 as Southern Satellite. She was purchased by the RFA in 1959 and broken up in 1978. * was a Leaf-class tanker launched in 1975 as Hudson Progress, and later renamed Balder London. She was acquired in 1984 and was decommissioned in September 2015. Category:Royal Fleet Auxiliary ship names
title: RFA Orangeleaf
